api_secret.description: Secret of API Key. This can also be set by environment variable `ILLUMIO_API_KEY_SECRET`

api_username.description: Username of API Key. This can also be set by environment variable `ILLUMIO_API_KEY_USERNAME`

backoff_time.description: Backoff Time (in seconds) on getting 429 (Too Many Requests). Default value: 10. Note: A default rate limit of 125 requests/min is already in place. A jitter of 1-5 seconds will be added to backoff time to randomize backoff.

ca_file.description: The path to CA certificate file (PEM). In case, certificate is based on legacy CN instead of ASN, set env. variable `GODEBUG=x509ignoreCN=0`. This can also be set by environment variable `ILLUMIO_CA_FILE`

insecure.description: Allow insecure TLS. Only `yes` will mark it insecure. This can also be set by environment variable `ILLUMIO_ALLOW_INSECURE_TLS`

max_retries.description: Maximum retries for an API request. Default value: 3

org_id.description: ID of the Organization. Default value: 1

pce_host.description: Host URL of Illumio PCE. This can also be set by environment variable `ILLUMIO_PCE_HOST`

proxy_creds.description: Proxy credential in format `username:password`. This can also be set by environment variable `ILLUMIO_PROXY_CREDENTIALS`

proxy_url.description: Proxy Server URL with port number. This can also be set by environment variable `ILLUMIO_PROXY_URL`

request_timeout.description: Timeout for HTTP requests. Default value: 30

container_runtime.description: The Container Runtime used in this Cluster

description.description: Description of the Cluster

kubelink_version.description: Kubelink software version string for Cluster

last_connected.description: Time the Cluster last connected to

name.description: Name of the Cluster. The name should be up to 255 characters

online.description: Whether the Cluster is online or not

pce_fqdn.description: PCE FQDN for this container cluster. Used in Supercluster only
